OCC.DAT:
; Your component defines here (optional)... #define SELECTIONCOLOR = #DDDDDD #define GRIDENTITY = EMPLOYEE.BOOTSTRAP
; Your component VARIABLES block here (optional)... variables string sortorder endvariables #include SYSTEM_LIBRARY:HILIGHTROW

operation exec
; Your pre-edit code here... retrieve ; Shows the form component and allow data entry (script execution stops here and continues after a close request) edit
; At this point, $status is: ; 9 when the trigger accept performend a close request ; 10 when the trigger quit performed a close request
; Your post-edit code here...
; Return execution status: ; return 0 ; return >= 0 typically indicates a succesful execution ; return -1 ; return < 0 typically indicates an error during execution return 0
end
trigger accept ; This trigger is fired by a macro ^ACCEPT (GOLD-A) and typically closes the component. ; It is only fired if the current active path is successfuly validated.
; Your implementation here...
; Return execution status: ; return 0 ; return >= 0 to allow the component to close and conrinue after edit statement ; return -1 ; return < 0 to prevent the component from closing return 0
end
trigger quit ; This trigger is fired by a macro ^QUIT (GOLD-Q) and typically closes the component
; Your implementation here...
; Return execution status: ; return 0 ; return >= 0 to allow the component to close and continue after edit statement ; return -1 ; return < 0 to prevent the component from closing return 0
end
trigger clear ; This trigger is fired by a macro ^CLEAR (GOLD-G) and typically cleares the data from the component without storing
; Your implementation here, e.g.: clear
return 0
end
trigger retrieve ; This trigger is fired on macro ^RETRIEVE (GOLD-R) and typically performs a data retrieve
; Your implementation here, e.g.: retrieve selectcase $procerror case 0 ; ok case -2, -4 message/info "Retrieve: No data found in the database." elsecase message/error "Retrieve: Error occurred - (%%($procerror))." endselectcase
return 0
end
trigger store ; This trigger is fired on macro ^STORE(GOLD-S) and typically performs a data store ; It is only fired if the current active path is successfuly validated.
variables numeric vProcError ; More variables here ... endvariables
; Your implementation here, e.g.: store selectcase $status case 1 ; no modifications message/warning "No modifications." case 0 ; store successful commit selectcase $procerror case 0 ; store and commit successful message/info "Store successful." elsecase ; commit error message/info "Commit failed ($procerror=%%($procerror))." endselectcase elsecase ; store failed vProcError = $procerror ; rollback rollback selectcase $procerror case 0 ; rollback successful message/error "Store failed ($procerror=%%(vProcError)) - transaction rolled back." elsecase ; rollback error message/error "Store failed ($procerror=%%(vProcError)) - Rollback failed ($procerror=%%($procerror))." endselectcase endselectcase
return 0
end
trigger erase ; This trigger is fired on macro ^ERASE (GOLD-E) and typically erases retrieved data
variables numeric vProcError ; More variables here ... endvariables
; Your implementation here, e.g.: erase ; Erase (delete and store) retrieved data of specified entity ; (make sure delete trigger is defined for entity) erase selectcase $procerror case 0 ; erase successful or no modifications commit selectcase $procerror case 0 ; erase and commit successful message/info "Erase successful." elsecase ; commit error message/info "Commit failed ($procerror=%%($procerror))." endselectcase elsecase ; erase failed vProcError = $procerror
; rollback rollback selectcase $procerror case 0 ; rollback successful message/error "Erase failed ($procerror=%%(vProcError)) - transaction rolled back." elsecase ; rollback error message/error "Erase failed ($procerror=%%(vProcError)) - Rollback failed ($procerror=%%($procerror))." endselectcase endselectcase
return 0
end

trigger detail
public web scope input output endscope
remocc "<$entname>", 0 store/e "<$entname>" commit
end

trigger detail public web ; Your SCOPE block here (optional)... ; Your VARIABLES block here (optional)...
; Your implementation here... clear/e "<UENTDB>" return (0) end

trigger detail ; Remove the current occurrence public web ; Mark the occurence as deleted putmess "Attempting to store data for '<UENTDB>'"
store/e "<UENTDB>" if ($status = 1) webmessage/info "No data has been changed. Nothing to save." return (0) endif
putmess "Saving '%%$entname' status was '%%$status'" commit if ($status = 0) webmessage "Data Saved" endif return (0)

trigger detail public web ; Your SCOPE block here (optional)... ; Your VARIABLES block here (optional)...
; Your implementation here...
clear/e "<UENTDB>" if ($length(SEARCHTEXT.DUMMY) > 0) <NAMEFIELD.<UENTDB>>/init = "%%searchtext&uALL;" endif retrieve/e "<UENTDB>" putmess "Returned %%$hits(<UENTDB>) records from '<UENTDB>' with profile of '%%searchtext'" return (0)
end

trigger onEdit ; This trigger is fired on every key press done by the user
; Your implementation here...
end

#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=LOCK trigger lock lock if ($status = -10) reload end #enddefine
#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=LMK trigger leaveModifiedKey retrieve/o if ($status < 0) if ($status = -15) message $text(2202) ; multiple hits: in foreign entity if ($status = -14) message $text(2205) ; multiple hits: not in foreign entity if ($status = -11) message $text(2009) ; occurrence currently locked if ($status = -7) message $text(2006) ; duplicate key if ($status = -4) message $text(2003) ; cannot open table or file if ($status = -3) message $text(2002) ; exceptional I/O error if ($status = -2) message $text(2200) ; key not found:in foreign entity else if ($status = 1) message $text(2201) ; key not found: foreign entity w/WRITE UP if ($status = 2) ; one occurrence found in foreign entity retrieve/e if ($status < 0) message $text(2002) ; I/O error detected endif if ($status = 3) message $text(2203) ; occurrence un-removed if ($status = 4) message $text(2204) ; key found: occurrence repositioned endif
return ($status) end #enddefine
#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=READ trigger read read if ($status >= 0) age = $int( ( $date - birthdate ) / 365) #ifdefined GRIDENTITY if ($curocc % 2 ) call OccurrenceSetFieldColors( "<GRIDENTITY>","<SELECTIONCOLOR>") endif #endif endif end #enddefine
#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=WRIT trigger write ; trigger: Write
if ($storetype = 1) numgen "EMPLOYEE_COUNT", 1, $variation ID/init = $result commit "$UUU" endif
write end #enddefine
#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=DELE trigger delete delete end #enddefine
#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=VLDK trigger validateKey findkey $entname, $curkey
selectcase $status case 0 ; key not found if ($foreign) ; non existing key in up entity return (-1) ; only if Write Up trigger not filled endif
case 1 ; key found in Component if (!$foreign) ; duplicate key in down entity return (-1) endif
case 2 ; key found in DBMS if (!$foreign) ; duplicate key in down entity return (-1) endif endselectcase
return (0) end #enddefine
